Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceSD.name: dice
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceSD.abstract: The dice that make up this collection, along with how many times they appear.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C08numbe.name: numberOfDice
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C08numbe.abstract: The number of dice in this Dice instance.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8modifi.name: modifier
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C8modifi.abstract: The modifier added or subtracted from these Dice

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.name: init(_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceAC.name: init(dice:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4diceAC.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.name: init(_:count:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the given number of the specified die. This is essentially identical to Dice(copyOf: die * count), but is more efficient.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.name: init(_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0CyAcA3Di.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice. They should be in a (die: Die, count: Int) form, with the die being the type of die to add, and the count being the number of times to add it.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.name: init(_:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4dice12.name: init(dice:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4dice12.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.name: init(_:count:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_5count.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the given number of the specified die, along with the specified modifier. This is essentially identical to Dice(copyOf: (die * count) + modifier), but is more efficient.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.name: init(_:withModifier:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C_12with.abstract: Creates a new Dice object with the specified dice and modifier. The dice should be in a (die: Die, count: Int) form, with the die being the type of die to add, and the count being the number of times to add it.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C6copyOf.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C6copyOf.abstract: Creates a new Dice object that is a copy of the given Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4rollyX.name: roll(times:_:)
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4rollyX.abstract: Rolls this Dice object the given number of times and returns the given result type.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13minim.name: minimumResult
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13minim.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13maxim.name: maximumResult
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C13maxim.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C16debug.name: debugDescription
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C16debug.abstract: A short, debug-usable description of this Dice object.

Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4copyAC.name: copy()
Classes/Dice.html#/s:7DiceKit0A0C4copyAC.abstract: Returns a copy of the given Dice with separate memory.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesS.name: sides
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesS.abstract: The number of sides on this Die. This value does not need to be possible (for example, it can be 13), but it does need to be larger than 0.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesA.name: init(sides:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC5sidesA.abstract: Creates a new Die with the given number of sides.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC6copyOf.name: init(copyOf:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC6copyOf.abstract: Creates a new Die that is a copy of the given Die.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4rollyX.name: roll(times:_:)
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4rollyX.abstract: Rolls this Die the given number of times and returns the given result type.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13minim.name: minimumResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13minim.abstract: The minimum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13maxim.name: maximumResult
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC13maxim.abstract: The maximum possible result from using the roll() method.

Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4copyAC.name: copy()
Classes/Die.html#/s:7DiceKit3DieC4copyAC.abstract: Returns a copy of the given Die with separate memory.

Classes/Dice.html.name: Dice
Classes/Dice.html.abstract: A collection of Die objects and/or a modifier that can be rolled using the roll() method.
